grapplecustomization.motorwhennotcrouchi: On/Off 버튼이 안 눌렸을 때만 작동
text.autoconfig.grapplemod.option.option: On/Off 버튼이 안 눌렸을 때만 작동
grapplecustomization.phaserope.desc: 로프가 블럭을 통과할 수 있도록 합니다
grapplecustomization.climbkey.desc: "climb" 키가 눌려있지 않으면 위로 오르기/아래로 내려가기 키의 작동을 무시합니다
grapplecustomization.sticky.desc: 로프가 닿아서 꺾이는 첫 번째 지점에 후크를 고정시킵니다
grapplecustomization.reelin.desc: 후크가 닿기 전에 웅크리면, 후크를 천천히 감아옵니다
grapplecustomization.sneakingverticalthr: 웅크리고 있을 때, 크로스헤어의 위쪽 방향으로 후크를 던집니다
이 기능을 활성화하면 버튼/키가 누른 상태에서만 후크가 발사됩니다. 후크를 회수하기 위해 키를 다시 클릭/누르는 대신 버튼/키를 놓으면 후크가 회수됩니다
On/Off 버튼(기본값: Shift)을 누르고 있을 때 모터가 활성화됩니다
grapplecustomization.motorwhennotcrouchi: On/Off 버튼(기본값: Shift)을 누르고 있지 않을 때 모터가 활성화됩니다
grapplecustomization.smartmotor.desc: 플레이어가 크로스헤어의 위 또는 아래로 이동할 수 있도록 모터의 속도를 조정합니다
grapplecustomization.motordampener.desc: 로프의 수직적 움직임을 줄여 로프가 더 똑바로 당겨집니다
grapplecustomization.pullbackwards.desc: 다른 방향을 보고 있어도 모터가 작동합니다
grapplecustomization.repel.desc: 플레이어가 흔들기 시 주변의 블럭에서 밀려납니다
grapplecustomization.smartdoublemotor.de: 모터와 함께 사용할 때 플레이어가 크로스헤어의 왼쪽/오른쪽으로 이동하도록 모터 속도를 조정합니다
grapplecustomization.sneakingangle.desc: 웅크릴 때 각 후크가 중앙에서 던져지는 각도(이 기능을 사용하려면 '웅크려서 감아 올리기'를 활성화하지 않아야 함)
grapplecustomization.oneropepull.desc: 모터가 활성화되고 후크가 하나만 연결되어 있으면 모터를 작동시킵니다(비활성화된 경우 두 후크가 모두 부착될 때까지 기다린 후 당깁니다)
grapplecustomization.rocket.desc: 버튼을 누른 상태에서 플레이어를 앞으로 이동시킵니다
재보급 전까지 로켓을 사용할 수 있는 시간(사용하지 않을 때 연료가 자동으로 재생됨)
grapplecustomization.rocket_refuel_ratio: 로켓이 사용된 시간과 비교하여 로켓이 연료를 재생하는 데 걸리는 시간의 비율(예: 2.0은 연료의 재생에 1초가 걸리는 단위를 의미함) 낮을수록 좋음)
text.autoconfig.grapplemod.option.option: Allows rope to phase through blocks
Ignore climb up/climb down keys unless the "climb" key is held
If the rope bends around a block as it is being thrown, attach at bend
Before the hook is attached, crouching will stop the hook from moving farther and slowly reel it in
Throws the grappling hook above the crosshairs by this angle
Throws the grappling hook above the crosshairs by this angle when crouching
When enabled, hook is only out while button/key is held down. Instead of clicking / pressing key again to detach the hook, release the button/key to detach hook.
Motor is active when On/Off button (default: shift) is being held
Motor is active when On/Off button (default: shift) is not being held
Adjusts motor speed so that player moves towards crosshairs (up/down)
Reduces motion perpendicular to the rope so that the rope pulls straighter
Motor pulls even if you are facing the other way
Acceleration of player when using movement keys while swinging
Player is repelled from nearby blocks when swinging
Force nearby blocks exert on the player
Hook is attracted to nearby blocks when thrown
Two hooks are thrown at once
Adjusts motor speed so that player moves towards crosshairs (left/right) when used with motor
Angle that each hook is thrown from center
Angle that each hook is thrown from center when crouching (don't have 'crouch to reel in' enabled if you want to use this)
When motor is enabled and only one hook is attached, activate the motor (if disabled, wait until both hooks are attached before pulling)
Propels the player forward while a button is held
How fast the rocket propels the player
The time that the rocket can be used until it has to refuel (fuel auto-regenerates when it is not being used)

The ratio of the time that the rocket takes to regenerate fuel, compared to the time the rocket is used. (e.g. 2.0 means a unit of fuel that takes 1 second to use up will take 2 seconds to regenerate. Lower is better. )
The angle upwards that the rocket force is applied
grappletooltip.repelleritem2.desc: 엔더 지팡이와 같이 사용할 수 있습니다
grappletooltip.longfallbootsrecipe.desc: 느린 낙하 IV 다이아몬드 부츠가 있는 그래플링 후크 수정 블럭을 마우스 오른쪽 버튼으로 클릭하여 획득
grapplemodifier.limits.desc: 해제하기 위해서는 제한 업그레이드를 사용해야 합니다
grapplemodifier.unlock2.desc: 다음 아이템을 들고 마우스 오른쪽 버튼을 클릭하세요
grapplemodifier.apply.desc: 그래플링 후크를 들고 마우스 오른쪽 버튼을 클릭해주세요
grapplemodifier.help.desc:
그래플링 훅으로 마우스 오른쪽 버튼을 클릭하여
적용하세요.
느린 낙하 4가 적용된 다이아몬드 부츠를 들고
마우스 오른쪽 클릭해 롱-폴 부츠를 얻으세요.
후크를 가죽 또는 수선으로 수리하세요.
Shift를 눌러 조작 방법을 살펴보세요.
text.autoconfig.grapplemod.option.option: Options that should be synced from the server to the client
Customization: Default values (when creating a new hook) and available values in the grappling hook modifier
If you want the hook to interact with different blocks differently
A list of (comma-separated, ID name) blocks that the grappling hook can attach to (aka whitelist)
A list of (comma-separated, ID name) blocks that the grappling hook can't attach to (aka blacklist)
A list of (comma-separated, ID name) blocks that the grappling hook will break if it hits (e.g. glass)
More config options for grappling hooks
If a hook hits a mob, yank it towards the player
If the player somehow manages to stretch the rope past its maximum length + this value (e.g. by teleporting), the rope snaps
Durability for the grappling hook item
When jumping from a rope, apply at most this speed (blocks/tick)
When jumping from a rope, jump in the angle of the rope (otherwise, jump up)
Don't allow jumping from a rope if player just jumped from another rope in less than this time ago (time in seconds).
How fast the player can climb a rope (blocks/tick)
Allow player to make long fall boots by right-clicking a grappling hook modifier block with feather falling IV diamond boots
Time it takes to rechange the ender staff (ticks)
When jumping off a wall, jump at speed upwards (blocks/tick)
When jumping off a wall, jump at speed sideways (blocks/tick)
Maximum time a player can spend wallrunning (seconds)
Keep the player's vertical momentum when double jumping
If the player is falling faster than this speed, don't allow double jumps (blocks/tick)
Jump from a slide at this speed (blocks/tick)
Mimumn speed required to start sliding
Minimum speed required to keep sliding
If true, automatically set allow-flight=true on servers (to prevent grappling hook from occasionally being misidentified as flying)
Maximum movement speed using the movement keys while in midair (blocks/tick) (after this mod has taken over movement (from a grappling hook / wallrun / ender staff / etc.)
Acceleration using movement keys while in midair (blocks/tick^2) (after this mod has taken over movement (from a grappling hook / wallrun / ender staff / etc.)
Disable this mod taking over movement while in midair (after this mod has taken over movement (from a grappling hook / wallrun / ender staff / etc.) (Note: minecraft has very high air friction)
text.autoconfig.grapplemod.option.client: Options which only accept the client (so don't need to be synced from server)
Time it takes to tilt the camera when starting to wallrun (seconds)
Play wallrun footsteps at most every this many seconds
grapplemod.jei_modifier_text:
업그레이드를 추가하고, 
인터페이스를 열어 수정하고,
후크를 들고 마우스 오른쪽 버튼을 클릭해 적용하세요.
